titleStmt.title: Indulgences graunted to all and euery crysten man and whoman in what soeuer party of the worlde they be, entrynge into the fraternyite of Saynt Katheryn in the mounte of Synay
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Pope (1513-1521 : Leo X)

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn at center of sheet, with loss of text.
Bound and filmed with STC 1967.3 following.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
